product_name: FARMACYLip Smoothie Vitamin C + Peptide Lip Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackFarmacy's Lip Smoothie Vitamin C + Peptide Lip Balm is a nourishing daily lip balm. Clinically proven to visibly plump, smooth, and reduce lip lines while locking in moisture - quickly and over time with a clear glossy finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsSmooths lip linesPeptides, vitamin C + upcycled fruit extract reduce lip lines instantly + over timeThis delicious lip smoothie leaves your lips sealed with moisture, volume + juicy shineKey IngredientsPeptides: visibly plumps and smooths lipsVitamin C: smooths the look of linesResearch ResultsClinically-proven to lock in moisture for 8 hours100% showed reduced lip lines100% showed smoother lip textureBased on clinical testing on 35 subjects after one useItem 2641323How To UseApply as needed. For external use onlyPro tip: Use as a lip primer and use on top of lipstick as a glossIngredientsHydrogenated Polyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polybutene, Flavor/ Aroma*, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Synthetic Wax, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelilla Cera/Cire De Candelilla, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Brassica Campestris/Aleurites Fordi Oil Copolymer, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Fragaria Ananassa (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Tribehenin, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Lactic Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Ubiquinone, Red 6 Lake (Ci 15850), Limonene, Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil, Vanillin, Benzaldehyde.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply as needed. For external use onlyPro tip: Use as a lip primer and use on top of lipstick as a gloss
ingredients: Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelilla Cera/Cire De Candelilla

reviews.headline: Perfect in every way
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this lip mask!  My super dry lips have healed so nicely - i put this product on before bed and in the morning, most of it is still there and i toss and turn a lot.  My lips dont feel tight anymore, very supple and fuller!  Very happy with my purchase.  I used to use much more expensive brands and my lips never felt this great.  The texture melts onto my skin and thr sents are heavenly.

reviews.headline: I'll stick with laneige
reviews.comments: This feels really nice initially, but it just sits on top of your lips and goes away immediately. Once I finish this I'm going back to laneige

reviews.headline: Very nourishing and shiny plus plumps your lips
reviews.comments:
Very nourishing and shiny plus plumps your lips. The apple scent smells great. I finished a whole jar.
I wish they removed the plumping peptides and keep it as a regular lip balm without plumping effects. 
I'm not buying another jar, because I don't want plumping of my lips.

reviews.headline: A New Personal Favorite
reviews.comments: I had recently run out of my laneige lip sleeping mask, was looking for something new, and came across this gem! It's smooth, weightless, smells amazing (I have apple), and best of all NOT GREASY OR STICKY! I mainly use it as a night time treatment since a little goes a long way, however it also works great as a pre-moisturizing treatment before applying lipsticks, lip tints, and liquid lipsticks (just be sure you wipe off a majority of it off first before applying color). My lips definitely feel way more smooth and plump with this product! Only thing I can gripe on is that I wish it had a little applicator that came with it instead of me dipping my finger into it.

reviews.headline: Soft Lips Overnight
reviews.comments: My lips cracked a bit the first time using this and that was it. Every morning i wake up with nice smooth lips

reviews.headline: Love the apple one!
reviews.comments: I recently was looking for lip masks and this one is lightweight, doesn't feel heavy at all. love it! It also smells sooo good!

reviews.headline: Only thing that repairs my lips
reviews.comments: I love these so much. I have the kiwi one and the honey one and i will forever repurchase them. These are the only things that actually repair my lips after them being dry or me picking at them. SO good and they smell really nice!

reviews.headline: Drying
reviews.comments: Super drying on the lips after it wears off. It feels hydrating and nice on the lips but wears off withing minutes and leaves lips feeling very dry. For the price, not worth it.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Feels great on my lips, I only need to apply it once in the morning and do not feel the need throughout the day for any lip balm or aides for my lips.

reviews.headline: I like that one
reviews.comments: It gives smooth edges to my lips

reviews.headline: the best lip balm hands down
reviews.comments:
I am on my third jar of this since it launched at Ulta a few months back. I can not rave about this enough. it makes my lips feel so smooth and instantly healing any cracking. I can feel the hydration on my lips for a long time between applications. 
you will not be disappointed in this product 
I do wish it can in a squeeze applicator for a more hygentic application.

reviews.headline: In love
reviews.comments: My go to for my purse and car lippy

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I would buy this again and again.  Long lasting.  Feels good.

reviews.headline: A Fruit Stand in a Jar for Your Lips
reviews.comments: I bought my first jar of Farmacy Lip Smoothie in Pear Kiwi because the tester smelled so fresh and looked enticing. After one application (you only need a little bit, less than the size of a pea) my lips felt intensely hydrated, looked juicy and shiny, and smelled incredibly fresh. I find that the hydrating effect and shine last even longer than the comparable Tatcha The Kissu Lip Mask. It lasts on my lips for about 1-3 hours before I reapply depending on if I eat or drink after putting it on. I like to use it as a heavenly mask for my lips at night before bed and before I go to work in the morning. I loved it so much that I went back days later and bought it in Mango as well - perfect scents for spring and summer! I can't wait to purchase the Honey Vanilla and Apple ones for fall.

reviews.headline: BETTER THAN LANEIGE
reviews.comments: I never thought I would say this, but this is in fact better than the laneige lip mask… and it's not even close. To give some context, I'm allergic to beeswax so I can't use chapsticks and a lot of lip balms. I also have really dry skin and don't drink as much water as I should… see my problem? Finding the laneige lip masks was life changing, and I wore this as my regular lip balm daily for the past few years. I recently picked up one of these farmacy lip smoothies because they were slightly cheaper and had an apple scent, which is my favorite scent. I figured the difference would be indistinguishable, but immediately I was impressed with how much more hydrating the lip smoothie was! I noticed I had to re-apply more frequently because my lips were DRINKING UP this smoothie vs the laniege that would mostly just sit on top of my lips and provide temporary hydration. The corners of my lips crack very frequently… again, BECAUSE I KNOW I DONT DRINK ENOUGH WATER… but this lip smoothie literally HEALED IT OVERNIGHT!!! That has never once happened with the Laniege lip masks. Obviously, I'm not trying to dunk too hard on laneige, I enjoyed their product for years, but this is just far superior and also more affordable and with better scents IMO. I'm going to pick up the pear kiwi scent tomorrow!

reviews.headline: Smooth like butter
reviews.comments: I want this in a tube for on thengo application!! Pretty please!!

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: The most hydrating lip balm ive ever used ! You dont need lots of product a tiny bit will do .

reviews.headline: Lushous lips
reviews.comments: This lip balm is so hydrating. Love the flavor too.

reviews.headline: Will continue to purchase
reviews.comments: Love this product and will continue to refer friends to also purchase. The dewy look is to die for my lips are no longer dry. It's also an added plus when your husband says your lips are calling for kisses

reviews.headline: I love it!!!
reviews.comments: I actually had tried this with a tester than instantly my lips were so soft especially with the constant change in weather. I bought it and I am obsessed with it! Definitely buying another one!

media.headline: Try it now! Your lips will thank you
media.caption: Your lips will thank you!

media.headline: My new favorite lip balm to use all the time!
media.caption: Such a great lip product!

media.headline: I'm obsessed with this lip product!

faceoff_positive.comments: This was Gifted by farmacybeauty. This was my first time ever trying any products from FarmacyBeauty. I've been on a journey lately trying to find the perfect lip care. I did find one I like and have been using for the last several months. My lips tend to get so dry during the winter which is when I focus on extra care for them to keep them soft and moisturized. I've never heard of the lip smoothie before and it's right up my alley to try! I received the lip smoothie in Honey Vanilla. The scent is exactly what it is, honey vanilla without being overpowering or artificial scented/taste. I immediately tried it that night and had my bestie tried it too. The texture of the lip smoothie is lightweight, kind of whipped, and a little sticky. I used my finger to apply and a little goes a long way! It was an almost immediate moisturizer for my lips. The lip smoothie left my lips shiny and my fingers a little sticky after applying. The stickiness didn't bother me as it wasn't sticky applying it on. When applying it to your lips, you can feel the slight warmth as it melts onto your lips. I tried it before I went to sleep. The next morning after, about 8 hours later, my lips were very soft and smooth! I didn't need to reapply again. I've been using it since for the last two weeks or so and it's my new favorite! I already went to look at what other scents they had. My bestie who was visiting also tried it and completely loved the lip smoothie too. She will be getting herself one also. I usually use it every night before bed or before I apply lipstick/lip stain before going out. Don't leave your lips dry and hanging, try it now!
faceoff_positive.headline: Try it now! Your lips will thank you

faceoff_negative.comments: I was super excited to try the honey vanilla variety of Farmacy's lip smoothie product after enjoying both apple and mango previously. The formula is just as lovely as the ones I've used before but this scent/flavor (Gifted by farmacybeauty) is not very pleasant. It reminds me of a cheap French vanilla candle with a little bit of a maple syrup note thrown in. As much as I love this line, skip honey vanilla for a different version!
faceoff_negative.headline: Honey vanilla is a miss but formula is lovely
